Package org.jerkar.api.file

Contains classes to manipulate files in a fluent way.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
JkFileTree Provides a view on files and sub-folders contained in a given directory.
JkFileTreeSet A set of JkFileTree.
JkPath A sequence of file (folder or archive) to be used as a path.
JkPathFilter Filter on relative path ala Ant pattern.
JkZipFile Wrapper around ZipFile to avoid checked exceptions.
JkZipper Defines elements to embed in a zip archive and methods to write archive on disk.
JkZipper.JkCheckSumer Wrapper on File allowing to creates digests on it.
 

Enum Summary
JkZipper.JkCompressionLevel Specify compression level
JkZipper.JkCompressionMethod Specify compression method
 

Package org.jerkar.api.file Description

Contains classes to manipulate files in a fluent way.
